verses.name: John 6:32
verses.text: Then Jesus said unto them, Verily, verily, I say unto you, Moses gave you not that bread from heaven; but my Father giveth you the true bread from heaven.

verses.name: John 6:33
verses.text: For the bread of God is he which cometh down from heaven, and giveth life unto the world.

verses.name: John 6:34
verses.text: Then said they unto him, Lord, evermore give us this bread.

verses.name: John 6:35
verses.text: And Jesus said unto them, I am the bread of life: he that cometh to me shall never hunger; and he that believeth on me shall never thirst.

verses.name: John 6:36
verses.text: But I said unto you, That ye also have seen me, and believe not.
